DADOS-BASICOS-DO-RELATORIO-DE-PESQUISA.TITULO: Maximum matching with ordering constraints is NP-complete

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
UFRGS/RP 362
A maximum weighted matching in a graph can be computed in polynomial time. In this paper we show that a variant, where the matching has to respect additional ordering constraints between the vertices makes the problem NP- complete.
